channel.title: Weilding help with dfs and dclaws =(
channel.description: [i]ok i have a delta scape server ;D but when i weild dclaws and then try dfs it weilds both of them how to i fix that.[/i]

item.title: Weilding help with dfs and dclaws =(
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:5, topic:391415”]First open client class and find something like this.

after that you should see a list of item ID’s like…int[] two_hand = {###,###}; # representing a item ID. Simply add your dragon claws ID into that list and it should fix your problem.[/quote]
TYSM i Love you (nohomo)

Read full topic
item.source: Weilding help with dfs and dclaws =(

item.title: Weilding help with dfs and dclaws =(
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

First open client class and find something like this.

after that you should see a list of item ID’s like…int[] two_hand = {###,###}; # representing a item ID. Simply add your dragon claws ID into that list and it should fix your problem.
